section.p: Chompo is the stronghold of the Northern Wistaria Clan, whose dominance of this region is so well-established that it is virtually the clan’s private kingdom.

Unlike most of the southern cities, the central district of Chompo is enclosed by high fortifications built of round timbers. Within are the homes of the aristocrats: austere but imposing mansions that lie in a curve around the hillside. Outside this stockade are the humbler dwellings of merchants and craftsmen.
